name: tintinnabulation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of ringing bells, or a sound like a bell ringing: I heard the faint tintinnabulation of a distant church bell. She creates a hideous tintinnabulation by applying a variety of metal tools to the strings of a piano.
More examplesFewer examplesThe deep tintinnabulation made the hairs at the back of my neck tingle.Her reply was drowned by the tintinnabulation of a gong that summoned us to the dining table.The piece consisted of the tiny tintinnabulations of a triangle that were amplified through a speaker.
